description: Can only be used by Villagers. Allows the villagers to create paths around the village.
title: Move Through Village

speed_multiplier.title: Speed Multiplier
speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal.

only_at_night.title: Only At Night
only_at_night.description: If true, the mob will only move through the village during night time.
